Channel.description: Communication channel types, e.g: email, mobile, phone, telefax

ContractGuid.description: The identifier of the contract this log belongs to

CorrelationIdentification.description: The CorrelationIdentification of the contract this log belongs to

ProcessName.description: The name of the process this log belongs to

Comment.description: A comment for describing what went wrong

Payload.description: The payload that that the process received

PrimaryProduct.description: Whether this is a primary product or supplementary product

Contracts.description: The contracts belonging to this account

OtherAccounts.description: The contracts belonging to this account's customer

RequestId.description: Guid to match request from requesters system

StartDate.description: If empty, then according to market requirements. Can be overrided according to market expectations and standards.

SourceIdentification.description: Contract/deal id from requesters system which can be used to query/update contract/deal information from requesters api's

Identification.example: Must be a verified accounting Point Id

SourceIdentification.description: Customer Id from requesters system which can be used to query customer information from requesters api's
